statements: UPDATE literature_review SET title = 'Introduction to Machine Learning', author = 'John Doe', publication_year = 2020 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE literature_review SET publication_year = 2018, abstract = 'This paper provides an overview of deep learning techniques' WHERE title = 'Deep Learning Review';
UPDATE literature_review SET title = 'New Title 1', publication_year = 2022 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE literature_review SET abstract = 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.' WHERE author = 'John Doe';
UPDATE literature_sources SET source_title = 'Updated Title', published_year = 2022 WHERE source_id = 1;
UPDATE review_comments SET reviewer_name = 'John Doe', comment_date = '2022-09-03' WHERE source_id = 2;
UPDATE literature_sources SET source_title = 'New Title', author_name = 'John Doe' WHERE source_id = 1;
UPDATE review_comments SET reviewer_name = 'Alice Smith', comment_text = 'Great review!', comment_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE source_id = 2;
UPDATE sources SET author='John Doe' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE citations SET citation_text='New citation text' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE sources SET author='John Doe', published_date='2022-03-15' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE citations SET citation_text='Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.', source_id=2 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE sources SET author = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE citations SET source_id = 2 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sources SET author='Jane Doe', publication_date='2021-09-15' WHERE id=101;
UPDATE keywords SET keyword='Database Systems' WHERE id=5;
UPDATE Authors SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe' WHERE author_id=1;
UPDATE Books SET year_published=2022, title='New Book Title' WHERE book_id=3;
UPDATE Authors SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE author_id = 1;
UPDATE Books SET year_published = 2021, title = 'Updated Title' WHERE book_id = 2;
